RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 1 1M Dirt CR: 53. Maiden Claiming Purse 7700. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TEST YOUR FAITH advanced on the backside wresting a clear lead on the far turn drawing out on the inside in upper stretch holding safe to wire. MAGIC CALL went evenly early emerging on the far turn vying from mid track down the lane a clear second best. ICY RAIN gave a mild rally on the far turn racing evenly through the lane. ISLAND BEAUTY stalked the pace pursuing on the far turn weakening in upper stretch. LITTLEBITOFLASH played no factor. COUNTESSOFLOVELACE was never involved. NIKITA set the early pace then wilted abruptly on the far turn. SONG OF THE HEART hustled wide was done early. FEEL THE RIDE stalked the early pace then folded up on the far turn. PER RULING FROM WEST VIRGINIA RACING COMMISSION, TEST YOUR FAITH WAS DISQUALIFIED FOR POSITIVE TEST.

ENTRY.NAME: Nikita
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, wilted abruptly far turn

ENTRY.NAME: Feel the Ride
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, folded up on far turn

ENTRY.NAME: Countessoflovelace
ENTRY.COMMENT: never involved

ENTRY.NAME: Magic Call
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly, gained far turn, bid mid track lane, second best,

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Fred W. Hertrich III & John D. Fielding

ENTRY.NAME: Island Beauty
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, chased to lane, wore down

ENTRY.NAME: dq-Test Your Faith
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, bid clear far turn, drew off top lane, held safe

ENTRY.NAME: Littlebitoflash
ENTRY.COMMENT: played no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Icy Rain
ENTRY.COMMENT: mild rally far turn, finished evenly,

ENTRY.NAME: Song of the Heart
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled wide, done early

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 69. Maiden Special Weight Purse 16500. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SAN ANDRES stalked the pace racing on the outside rallying to wrest the lead abreast rival in upper stretch edging clear under a drive. PERFECT MOON tracked evenly through the turn angling to mid track in upper stretch vying willingly to wire. KNOCKOUT GUY slow early rallied from the rail on the turn bidding in upper stretch losing momentum late in overall good effort. MOON OVER DUBAI away alertly set the pace through the turn being hooked in upper stretch wearing out late. MO TOWN BLUES played no factor. BAYTOWN BEAVER carried in early was not involved. AWFUL BUT LAWFUL was always outrun. ARCH EGO chased to the quarter pole then wilted in upper stretch. SENSE OF GOLDEN bumped at the break was always outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Perfect Moon
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked evenly, angled kid track lane, rallied for place

ENTRY.NAME: Knockout Guy
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, rallied on the rail turn, bid upper stretch, good eff

ENTRY.NAME: Mo Town Blues
ENTRY.COMMENT: played no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Awful But Lawful
ENTRY.COMMENT: always outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: Baytown Beaver
ENTRY.COMMENT: carried in early, not involved

ENTRY.NAME: Arch Ego
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased to 1/4 pole, spent

ENTRY.NAME: Sense of Golden
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped break, outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: San Andres
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace outside, led abreast top lane, edged clear

ENTRY.NAME: Moon Over Dubai
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace, hooked top lane, faded

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 3 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 88. Claiming Purse 8700. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE APRIL 23, 2023. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since September 23 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: UNYIELDING stalked the pace rallying to draw even in upper stretch clearing on the inside holding firm to wire. THE FILTER rallied on the turn bidding from mid track down the lane salvaging place. HIDING THE BRICK a step slow early angled out to upper stretch finishing evenly six wide. MAS CHIKILIN pressed a narrow lead through the turn dueling inside of foe in upper stretch weakening late. EQUAL JUSTICE pressured the pace through the turn then tired in upper stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Mas Chikilin
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed narrow lead through turn, hooked lane, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Equal Justice
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, tired lane

ENTRY.NAME: The Filter
ENTRY.COMMENT: rallied on the turn, bid mid track lane, salvaged place

ENTRY.NAME: Unyielding
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, led upper stretch, clear inside, held fime

ENTRY.NAME: Hiding the Brick
ENTRY.OWNER: Gray Christopher L and Gray Melissa R
ENTRY.COMMENT: step slow, angled out lane, finished evenly 6 wide,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 4 1M Dirt CR: 80. Claiming Purse 8300. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE OCTOBER 23, 2022 OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since September 23 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4, 000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TAKECHARGEJUSTICE stalked the pace drawing even on the far turn appearing to hang on the outside in upper stretch finding a final surge to win clear. BACK ALLEY CAT slow early rallied on the far turn vying from the two path down lane getting up for place in the last yards. POWER (BRZ) tracked evenly to the far turn chasing to upper stretch gaining a spot late. CAPTAIN RILEY pressed the pace through the far turn leading on the inside in upper stretch faltering late near the rail. PRECIOUS JULES played no factor. HELLUVA LIFE pressured the pace through the far turn ceding in upper stretch being worn out late. RUM ON THE ROCKS stalked through the backside then gave way on the far turn.

ENTRY.NAME: Captain Riley
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, led upper stretch, faltered on the inside

ENTRY.NAME: Back Alley Cat
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, rallied far turn, bid inside lane, saved place

ENTRY.NAME: Rum On the Rocks
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, gave way on the far turn

ENTRY.NAME: Helluva Life
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, ceded lane, empty late

ENTRY.NAME: Precious Jules
ENTRY.COMMENT: played no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Takechargejustice
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, drew even far turn, final surge to clear

ENTRY.NAME: Power (BRZ)
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked evenly, chased to lane, gaining a spot late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 76. Claiming Purse 8500. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON THREE RACES SINCE OCTOBER 23, 2022 OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE APRIL 23, 2023. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since September 23 Allowed 3 lbs. C laiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SHOW ME THE BEST gave a quick move racing four deep on the turn clearing in upper stretch holding firm to wire. ROYAL TO BE crowded after the break dropped well back closing five wide into upper stretch bidding gamely down the lane at mid track. WAY TO FIRE hustled in pursuit along the inside vied from the rail down the lane finishing evenly. FIANNA HILLS pressed the pace through the turn fading in upper stretch. G MONEY LIV sent hard dueled through the turn then wore out in upper stretch. KANFU chased the pace through the turn giving way in upper stretch. BLACK BUTTE fractious in the gate reared high at the break losing all chance.

ENTRY.NAME: G Money Liv
ENTRY.COMMENT: sent hard, dueled through the turn, wore out

ENTRY.NAME: Royal to Be
ENTRY.COMMENT: in tight break, 5 wide move into lane, bid gamely,

ENTRY.NAME: Way to Fire
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled inside, chased to lane, finished evenly,

ENTRY.NAME: Kanfu
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace, spent lane

ENTRY.NAME: Fianna Hills
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, faded lane

ENTRY.NAME: Show Me the Best
ENTRY.COMMENT: quick move four deep turn, cleared top lane, held firm

ENTRY.NAME: Black Butte
ENTRY.COMMENT: fractious reared high at the break

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 6 1M Dirt CR: 87. Allowance Purse 18800. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since September 23 Allowed 3 lbs. (Cla iming Races For $10,000 Or Less Not Considered In Estimating Allowances)(W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GOLDEN TONE slow early circled out to upper stretch hitting best stride late sweeping past to win clear near mid track. MUGSY MALONE pressed the pace dueling through the far turn digging in with a late lead ceding to outside pressure. POSEIDON'S SON pressed the pace dueling through the turn into upper stretch coming up a bit short late. LUCKY JUNIOR slow early played no factor. HIGH YIELD KITTEN gave early retreat. ANOTHER BREEZE pressed the pace ceding on the far turn, was pulled up seventy yards out and walked off after the race.

ENTRY.NAME: Golden Tone
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, circled out to upper stretch, swept past late

ENTRY.NAME: Another Breeze
ENTRY.COMMENT: pulled up, walked off

ENTRY.NAME: Mugsy Malone
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, dueled far turn, led late, out finished

ENTRY.NAME: Lucky Junior
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Poseidon's Son
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, dueled to upper stretch, ame up a bit short

ENTRY.NAME: High Yield Kitten
ENTRY.COMMENT: gave early retreat

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 7 1M Dirt CR: 89. Starter Allowance Purse 14200. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $4,000 OR LESS IN 2022 - 2023. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since September 23 Allowed 3 lbs. (Claiming Races For $5,000 Or Les s Not Considered In Estimating Allowances) (Preference To Highest Earnings In 2022 - 2023).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BLAME IT ON EDDIE hustled to the early lead set the pace widening along the inside in upper stretch holding to late pressure. LAUTREC tracked the pace into upper stretch rallying late abreast rival being held at bay in the closing yards. BEN LOMOND raced evenly rallying on the far turn racing evenly from mid track down the lane. PEACE OF EKATI slow early raced evenly to upper stretch holding off the others there. CHOPPED slow early played no factor. PERFETTO was never involved. SUPER CLASSIC stalked the early pace then gave way abruptly on the far turn.

ENTRY.NAME: Lautrec
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked pace, angled out lane, closed the gap late

ENTRY.NAME: Blame It On Eddie
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled to top, set pace, widened top lane, held driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Super Classic
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, gave way abruptly far turn

ENTRY.NAME: Ben Lomond
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly, vied on the far turn, finished evenly mid track

ENTRY.NAME: Peace of Ekati
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, evenly to lane, held off the others

ENTRY.NAME: Chopped
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, played no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Perfetto
ENTRY.COMMENT: never involved

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 8 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 68. Claiming Purse 7800. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since September 23 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ANGUSONIC pressed a narrow lead to upper stretch digging in gamely to outside pressure. BORN HAPPY pressed on the turn extending outside of rival down the lane being denied. BOURBON TALKING chased on the inside to upper stretch looming there hanging late. OCEAN KISS rallied to bid on the turn then went evenly through the lane. IN THE GOSPEL pressed then chased on the turn fading in upper stretch. TRADER PRICE faded on the turn. VAMOS ANTONIO gained on the turn then flattened out in upper stretch. OXBOW'S RIDE was always outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Bourbon Talking
ENTRY.OWNER: Quarter Pole Investments LLC and Fletcher Kevin
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased inside, loomed lane, hung late

ENTRY.NAME: In the Gospel
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed early, faded

ENTRY.NAME: Angusonic
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed narrow lead, dug in lane, held gamely,
